level.heading: ALTERATION OF MOTOR VEHICLE EXHAUST SYSTEM (ยง 20-2812)

level.text: No person shall modify or alter the exhaust system of a motor vehicle or motorcycle in a manner that will amplify or increase the noise emitted by the vehicle above the level permitted under ยง2811 of this chapter.

2812 .2 No person shall use or operate a motor vehicle or a motorcycle having an exhaust system that has been modified or altered in a manner that will amplify or increase the noise emitted by the vehicle above the level permitted under ยง2811 of this chapter.

level.heading: SOURCE
